thread.title: Gopi Sunder is as busy as a bee
thread.title_full: Gopi Sunder is as busy as a bee - The Times of India

author: Anjana George
title: Gopi Sunder is as busy as a bee
text:
Gopi Sunder is busy composing songs for Tamil, Telugu and Malayalam films.
Gopi's upcoming songs will be in Mohanlal-starrer Pulimurugan; Charlie, with Dulquer Salmaan and Parvathy in the lead, Uppri, a Tamil-Telugu bilingual starring Nagarjuna and Karthi, Telugu flicks Seetamma Andaalu Raamayyaa Sittralu and I Hate You (starring Naga Chaitanya), the remake of Bangalore Days in Tamil and Premam in Telugu...
